meanings.definition: Abstaining from extramarital, or from all, sexual intercourse.
meanings.sent1: She always wore a chaste white dress to show her purity.
meanings.sent2: The painting's chaste beauty captivated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat's chaste behavior of not chasing the mouse was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The chaste moonlight illuminated the garden like a spotlight.
meanings.sent5: His chaste demeanor made him stand out among his peers.

meanings.definition: Pure in style; not excessively ornamented; simple.
meanings.sent1: The chaste design of the room made it feel spacious and clean.
meanings.sent2: Her chaste handwriting was easy to read and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The chaste cake with no frosting looked plain but tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: The chaste melody of the piano echoed through the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The chaste lines of the sculpture conveyed a sense of tranquility.
